snippet: Acquired in a trade with the Hawks in which the Nets did not have to surrender any of the team's key players, Joe Johnson is an underrated star who may finally have found the right home.
abstract: Acquired in a trade with the Hawks in which the Nets did not have to surrender any of the team's key players, Joe Johnson is an underrated star who may finally have found the right home.

headline.main: First-Rate Second Option For Nets' Offense
headline.print_headline: First-Rate Second Option For Nets’ Offense
